description.value:
Ghostwise culture is secretive and almost xenophobic. Committed to total honesty among members of your culture, you're capable of telepathically sending messages to nearby creatures.

Silent Speech. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.RZY4PrOTBXY11yXD]{Silent Speech} You can speak telepathically to any creature within 30 feet of you. The creature understands you only if the two of you share a language.

Ghostwise Magic. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.6tHrACPObsxyMfVa]{Ghostwise Magic} You know the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.Z9FETGPT6M1R0JBX]{Gust} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]{Detect Thoughts} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj]{Calm Emotions} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

Intuitive. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.db2pcHKsBQ2imSVD]{Intuitive} You are proficient in the Insight skill.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Halfling.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
